entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WiP] Obsolete Setting MainPage and direct users to CreateWindow #23518
    9.0-preview7
  • Delete all of the Use <Control>Handler.Mapper instead mappers that we obsoleted in NET8 #23516
    9.0-preview7
  • CollectionView in ios renders very slow when grouped. #23510
  • [iOS] IndicatorView IndicatorSize Overwritten to Default After Updating ObservableCollection in CarouselView #23508
  • Maui webview .Navigated event is not triggered #23502
    Backlog
  • LinearGradientBrush as background page has an issue on IOS screen rotation #23501
    Backlog
  • Debug app crashes on iPhone 8 when running it directly, not debugging it. #23499
  • [Android, 9.0 Preview 5] When run from command line (dotnet build), resizetizer still randomly fails with something being used by another process. #23495
  • [iOS] Border often has wrong initial bounds #23494
    Backlog
  • BindableLayout.ItemsSource no longer works in 8.0.61 #23491

Closed

  • [net9.0][testing] Android Compatibility UITests are not working on net9.0 branch #22267
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Customize Android splash screen page #23450
  • Add an IsVisible Property to <Span> Elements #23470
  • Starting a new Activity from main activity throws error #23493
  • MultiTrigger not executed properly #23498
  • Maui's usage of Reflection to find op_Implicit operators is not trim-compatible #5023
  • choppy scrolling with CollectionView #21019

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't throw exceptions on back-to-back window deactivations #23519
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Add missing ctor overloads to MaterialButton #23517
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Subscribe pointer events only when needed #23515
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #23513

Merged

  • [net9] Bring changes from p6 release branch back into net9.0 #23404
  • Bump issue template to latest releases #23504
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #23497

Updated

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Update versions preview6 public #23520
  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • [android]: ModalContainer Destroy commit allowing state loss #23400
    community ✨
  • [windows] fix VisualDiagnosticsOverlay keeping Page's alive #23489
    platform/windows 🪟, memory-leak 💦
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fix iOS log exports #23334
    area-infrastructure
  • Add analyzer for TestCase and missing Category #23465
    area-testing
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Binding SG] Add an API for creating instances of TypedBinding #23239
    area-xaml, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨
  • Do not solely make Visual Diagnostics available on debugger being attached #23490
  • [net9] BackButtonBehavior enhancement - Changed IsVisible & IsEnabled BindingMode to OneWay #23467
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] CarouselView: Changing Position after navigation away then comi… #23477
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, migration-compatibility
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
